Swordigo is now free! If you own an earlier version of Swordigo, you will continue to have an ad-free experience and will receive the coin doubler in-app-purchase for free after updating.

Previously:
- Optimized for iOS 9 and 4.7-inch and 5.5-inch screens.
- Added MFi game controller support.
- Fixed issues with iCloud syncing.

If you encounter any issues with your update, please contact us at support@touchfoo.com
